## Project Overview

:::{.text-justify}
I chose the city of Pergamino in Buenos Aires, Argentina for this toponym-based challenge because its robust [spatial data infrastructure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spatial_data_infrastructure) provided access to complete street name data, which I categorized as follows:

* Commemorative dates
* Male figures
* Female figures
* Geographical places
* Nature (animals, plants, or bodies of water)
* Unclassified/other: including numbered roads and abstract concepts like "Sovereignty", and names I couldn’t confidently classify.

:::
## Data Sources and Tools

* Streets: [IDE Pergamino](https://ide.pergamino.gob.ar/#)
* Basemap: [Argenmap by National Geography Institute of Argentina](https://www.ign.gob.ar/AreaServicios/Argenmap/Introduccion)

****
* Made with ![](../images/QGIS.png){width=1em style="vertical-align: middle;"}[GIS](https://qgis.org/project/overview/) 3.22.4-Białowieża

## Interactive map
```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-summary: "Click to view the code"
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(sf)
library(leaflet)

# 1. LOAD & CLEAN DATA
sf_use_s2(FALSE)
streets <- st_read("../shapefiles/red_vial.geojson" , quiet = TRUE)
streets <- st_zm(streets) 

# 2. PREPARE COLORS AND CATEGORIES
labels_map <- c(
  "Fecha" = "Commemorated Dates",
  "L"     = "Geographic Places",
  "H"     = "Male Names",
  "M"     = "Female Names",
  "O"     = "Unclassified / Other",
  "N"     = "Nature (Plants/Animals)"
)

streets$CATE <- ifelse(streets$CATE %in% names(labels_map), labels_map[streets$CATE], "Unclassified / Other")
streets$CATE[is.na(streets$CATE)] <- "Unclassified / Other"

cate_palette <- c(
  "Commemorated Dates"      = "#f2eb19",
  "Geographic Places"       = "#6e4eed",
  "Male Names"              = "#3badde",
  "Female Names"            = "#f762e3",
  "Nature (Plants/Animals)" = "#4cc630",
  "Unclassified / Other"    = "#dc6f35"
)

streets$CATE <- factor(streets$CATE, levels = names(cate_palette))
pal_cate <- colorFactor(palette = cate_palette, domain = streets$CATE)

# 3. RENDER MAP
leaflet(streets) %>%
  setView(lng = -60.57, lat = -33.89, zoom = 13) %>%
  addTiles(
    urlTemplate = "https://wms.ign.gob.ar/geoserver/gwc/service/tms/1.0.0/capabaseargenmap@EPSG%3A3857@png/{z}/{x}/{-y}.png",
    attribution = "Argenmap - IGN Argentina",
    options = tileOptions(tms = FALSE)
  ) %>%
  addPolylines(
    color = ~pal_cate(CATE),
    weight = 2,
    opacity = 0.7,
    popup = ~paste(
      "<b>Street Name:</b>", nombre, "<br>",
      "<b>Category:</b>", CATE
    ),
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
      weight = 7, color = "white", bringToFront = TRUE
    )
  ) %>%
  addLegend(
    position = "bottomright",
    pal = pal_cate,
    values = ~CATE,
    title = "Legend"
  )
```
